title: Contributing to scry
text: can fix typos, spelling mistakes, grammatical errors documentation directly using GitHub web interface, long changes made source file. generally means ’ll need edit roxygen2 comments .R, .Rd file. can find .R file generates .Rd reading comment first line.

title: Contributing to scry
text: want make bigger change, ’s good idea first file issue make sure someone team agrees ’s needed. ’ve found bug, please file issue illustrates bug minimal reprex (also help write unit test, needed).

title: Contributing to scry
text: Fork package clone onto computer. haven’t done , recommend using usethis::create_from_github("curso-r/scry", fork = TRUE). Install development dependencies devtools::install_dev_deps(), make sure package passes R CMD check running devtools::check(). R CMD check doesn’t pass cleanly, ’s good idea ask help continuing. Create Git branch pull request (PR). recommend using usethis::pr_init("brief-description--change"). Make changes, commit git, create PR running usethis::pr_push(), following prompts browser. title PR briefly describe change. body PR contain Fixes #issue-number. user-facing changes, add bullet top NEWS.md (.e. just first header). Follow style described https://style.tidyverse.org/news.html.

title: Contributing to scry
text: New code follow tidyverse style guide. can use styler package apply styles, please don’t restyle code nothing PR. use roxygen2, Markdown syntax, documentation. use testthat unit tests. Contributions test cases included easier accept.

title: Contributing to scry
text: Please note scry project released Contributor Code Conduct. contributing project agree abide terms.

title: Colors and Costs
text: Whenever API presents set Magic colors, column vector uses uppercase, single-character abbreviations colors. example, <"W", "U"> represents something white blue. Colorless sources denoted empty vector NULL. Common places might see kind vector scry_cards()’s colors color_identity. color column NULL NA, implies information pertinent current object. imply object colorless. Color vectors guaranteed particular order. list color representations provided :

title: Colors and Costs
text: Whenever API presents mana costs card symbols, using official plaintext notation symbol set forth Comprehensive Rules. example, “, ” written {2/W}, {T}. exhaustive list symbology provided . can also retrieve information programmatically using scry_symbols() function. Note symbols use UTF-8 characters outside ASCII range.

title: Frames

title: Card Imagery
text: Card images Scryfall copyright Wizards Coast (/artist, old sets) provided purpose creating additional Magic software, creating community content (videos, set reviews, etc) Magic related products. using images Scryfall, please adhere following guidelines: cover, crop, clip copyright artist name card images. distort, skew, stretch card images. blur, sharpen, desaturate, color-shift card images. add watermarks, stamps, logos card images. place card images way implies someone Wizards Coast created card another game besides Magic: Gathering. particular, using art_crop: List artist name copyright elsewhere interface presenting art crop, use full card image elsewhere interface. Users able identify artist source image somehow.

title: Layouts and Faces
text: Magic cards can include multiple faces single piece card stock. Scryfall includes information card faces using card_faces column. Please note following types multi-face cards Scryfall describe : Split cards (Comp. rules term): Split cards sorceries instant cards include two faces caster can choose face cast. back split card normal Magic back. Flip cards (Comp. rules term): Flip cards two parts permanent printed vertically one side card. play, ability card causes permanent flip (rotate 180°) side. back flip card normal Magic back. Double-faced cards (Comp. rules term): cards two faces different sides cardstock related . whole card single legal deckbuilding object. Double-faced cards can either transforming modal. Transforming double-faced cards (Comp. rules term): cards can either transform entering battlefield, can put onto battlefield already transformed. Scryfall use card_faces column describe two different transformed modes card. cards layout set “transform”. Modal double-faced cards (Comp. rules term): Modal DFCs may cast played either half card. Scryfall use card_faces column describe two different modes card. cards layout set “modal_dfc”. Reversible cards (casual term): term used Scryfall WotC describe piece cardstock two distinct Magic cards tokens printed opposite sides. two halves card related way treated two separate objects gameplay deckbuilding. overall card layout set “reversible_card”, individual card_face objects layout columns describing distinct printings sides. Multi-faced cards (casual term): term rules meaning used Scryfall describe object nested card_faces property. Double-sided cards (casual term): term rules meaning used casually refer cards gameplay information sides.

title: Regular Expressions
text: Scryfall supports POSIX regular expression constructs, many detailed . regular expressions following configuration limits: expression includes forward slashes / must escaped: \\/ Scryfall regular expressions Unicode-aware. . match characters beyond ASCII range. Backreferences supported (\\1, \\2, etc). regular expressions case-insensitive (). regular expressions “multiline” mode (m). Line anchors match paragraphs Oracle text, instead entire block. characters expression significant whitespace matched (sometimes listed “tight mode”). add configuration regular expressions Scryfall. example o:/tap/ work o:/tap/gi . Scryfall regular expressions match-. Scryfall support extracting data capture groups performing substitutions. Scryfall uses \n character newlines text fields across entire database. fields include \r \f. Scryfall database include bells (\), null-bytes (\0), esoteric control characters.

Make sure read scry_cards()’ full documentation diving ! curious, relevant information cards can found vignette("syntax") (Query Syntax) vignette("layouts") (Layouts Faces). important function scry_cards(). returns data frame card data given query: Note many columns list-columns deeply nested information inside. result Scryfall’s data model reason scry needs tibbles work. don’t alarmed! ’s pretty consistent. also “singular” functions, , functions return one card instead many. scry_card() siblings, methods find card given sort identifier. ’re unsure exactly card ’re looking , don’t worry. Scryfall also endpoint tries autocomplete name card scry makes available don’t ever leave R look card.

… with 38 more rows, and 62 more variables: oracle_text <chr>, #> #   power <chr>, toughness <chr>, type_line <chr>, edhrec_rank <int>, #> #   keywords <list>, layout <chr>, legalities <list>, oversized <lgl>, #> #   reserved <lgl>, oracle_id <chr>, mtgo_id <int>, #> #   multiverse_ids <list>, tcgplayer_id <int>, cardmarket_id <int>, #> #   uri <chr>, scryfall_uri <chr>, rulings_uri <chr>, #> #   prints_search_uri <chr>, artist <chr>, artist_ids <list>, … # Get Anje's related cards vampires %>%   filter(name == "Anje, Maid of Dishonor") %>%   pull(all_parts) #> [[1]] #> # A tibble: 2 × 6 #>   object       id         component  name     type_line   uri            #>   <chr>        <chr>      <chr>      <chr>    <chr>       <chr>          #> 1 related_card 1bfac4ab-… combo_pie… Anje, M… Legendary … https://api.s… #> 2 related_card a6f374bc-… token      Blood    Token Arti… https://api.s…  # Get Anje's color identity vampires %>%   filter(name == "Anje Falkenrath") %>%   pull(color_identity) #> [[1]] #> [1] "B" "R" # Using an ID scry_card("913dd06f-ed2f-4128-9c9d-9cd0d8a55425")$name #> [1] "Anje Falkenrath"  # Using a name scry_card_name("Anje Falkenrath")$name #> [1] "Anje Falkenrath"  # Using a collector number and a set scry_card_number(37, "c19")$name #> [1] "Anje Falkenrath"  # Just get a random vampire commander scry_card_random("t:vampire t:legend")$name #> [1] "Rayami, First of the Fallen" # There she is autocomplete_name("falken")[12] #> [1] "Anje Falkenrath"

title: Query Syntax
text: can find cards certain color using c: color: keyword, cards certain color identity using id: identity: keywords. sets keywords accepts full color names like blue abbreviated color letters w, u, r, b g. can use many nicknames color sets: guild names (e.g. azorius), shard names (e.g. bant), college names (e.g., quandrix), wedge names (e.g. abzan), four-color nicknames chaos, aggression, altruism, growth, artifice supported. Use c colorless match colorless cards, m multicolor match multicolor cards. can use comparison expressions (>, <, >=, <=, !=) check ranges colors. Find cards color indicator :indicator.

title: Query Syntax
text: Find cards certain card type t: type: keywords. can search supertype, card type, subtype. Using partial words allowed.

title: Query Syntax
text: Use o: oracle: keywords find cards specific phrases text box. can put quotes " " around text punctuation spaces. can use ~ text placeholder card’s name. keyword usually checks current Oracle text cards, uses --date phrasing available. example, “dies” instead “put graveyard”. Use fo: operator search full Oracle text , includes reminder text. can also use keyword: search cards specific keyword ability.

title: Query Syntax
text: Use m: mana: keyword search cards certain symbols mana costs. keyword uses official text version mana costs set forth Comprehensive Rules. example, {G} represents green mana. Shorthand allowed symbols aren’t split: G {G}. However, must always wrap complex/split symbols like {2/G} braces. can search mana costs using comparison operators; mana cost greater another includes symbols , ’s less includes subset symbols. can find cards specific converted mana cost manavalue mv, comparing numeric expression (>, <, =, >=, <=, !=). can also find even odd mana costs manavalue:even manavalue:odd can filter cards contain hybrid mana symbols :hybrid Phyrexian mana symbols :phyrexian can find permanents provide specific levels devotion, using either single-color mana symbols devotion one color, hybrid symbols devotion two, devotion: comparison operator. can also find cards produce specific types mana, produces:

title: Query Syntax
text: can use numeric expressions (>, <, =, >=, <=, !=) find cards certain power, power/pow, toughness, toughness/tou, total power toughness, pt/powtou, starting loyalty, loyalty/loy. can compare values provided number.

title: Query Syntax
text: can find cards one face :split (split cards), :flip (flip cards), :transform (cards transform), :meld (cards meld), :leveler (cards Level ), :dfc (double-faced cards), :mdfc (modal double-faced cards). information see vignette("layouts").

title: Query Syntax
text: Find cards cast spells :spell. Find permanent cards :permanent, historic cards :historic, creatures can party :party, modal effects :modal, vanilla creatures :vanilla, French vanilla cards :frenchvanilla.

title: Query Syntax
text: Vanguard, plane, scheme, phenomenon cards hidden default, cards “memorabilia” sets. must either search type (using t: keyword) set contains (e: keyword). Un-cards, holiday cards, funny cards findable :funny mentioning set. may also use include:extras reveal absolutely every card search.

title: Query Syntax
text: Use r: rarity: find cards print rarity. can search common, uncommon, rare, special, mythic, bonus. can also use comparison operators like < >=. Use new:rarity find reprint cards printed new rarity first time. can find cards ever printed given rarity using : (example, :rare find cards ever printed rare.)

title: Query Syntax
text: Use s:, e:, set:, edition: find cards using Magic set code. Use cn: number: find cards collector number within set. Combine s: find specific card editions. Searching ranges syntax like cn>50 also possible. Use b: block: find cards Magic block providing three-letter code set block. : keyword finds cards “passed ” given set code. example :lea match cards appeared Alpha. can search cards based type product appear . includes high-level categories (st:boxset, st:multiplayer, st:beginner), primary product types (st:core st:expansion), series products (st:masters, st:unset, st:portal, st:commander, st:duel_deck, st:from_the_vault, st:premium_deck) categories promo cards (st:fnm, st:judge_gift, st:arena_league, st:player_rewards, st:media_insert, st:tourney, st:gateway, st:wpn, st:instore, st:convention, st:set_promo, st:duels, st:event, st:premiere_shop, st:masterpiece — whew!) : keyword also supports set types, can search cards printings set type query like -:core. can also search individual cards sold certain places :booster :planeswalker_deck, specific types set promos :league, :buyabox, :giftbox, :intro_pack, :gameday, :prerelease, :release, among others.

title: Query Syntax
text: Find cards part cube lists using cube: keyword. currently supported cubes arena, grixis, legacy, chuck, twisted, protour, uncommon, april, modern, amaz, tinkerer, livethedream, chromatic, vintage.

title: Query Syntax
text: Use f: format: keywords find cards legal given format. can also find cards explicitly banned format banned: keyword restricted restricted: keyword. current supported formats : standard, future (Future Standard), historic, gladiator, pioneer, modern, legacy, pauper, vintage, penny (Penny Dreadful), commander, brawl, historicbrawl, alchemy, paupercommander, duel (Duel Commander), oldschool (Old School 93/94), premodern. can use :commander find cards can commander, :brawler find cards can Brawl Commander, :companion find Companion cards, :duelcommander find cards can Duel Commander. Finally, can find cards Reserved List :reserved.

title: Query Syntax
text: can find prints within certain usd, eur, tix price ranges comparing numeric expression (>, <, =, >=, <=, !=). can find cheapest print card cheapest:usd, cheapest:eur, cheapest:tix.

title: Query Syntax
text: Search cards illustrated certain artist :, artist: keywords. can search cards one artist using artists>1. Search words card’s flavor text using ft: flavor: keywords. Search card’s affiliation watermark using wm: watermark: keywords, match cards watermarks using :watermark. , can wrap statements spaces punctuation quotes " ". can find cards printed new illustrations using new:art, illustrated particular artist first time new:artist, brand-new flavor text using new:flavor. can compare many different illustrations give card things like illustrations>1.

title: Query Syntax
text: Use border: keyword find cards black, white, silver, borderless border. can find cards specific frame edition using frame:1993, frame:1997, frame:2003, frame:2015, frame:future. can also search particular frame-effects, frame:legendary, frame:colorshifted, frame:tombstone, frame:nyxtouched. can find cards full art using :full. new:frame find cards printed specific frame first time. card available non-foil, foil, . can find prints available :nonfoil :foil, :foil :nonfoil find prints (like booster cards) available . can also find cards available etched foil glossy finishes :etched :glossy. can find cards database high-resolution images using :hires. Search card’s security stamp stamp:oval, stamp:acorn, stamp:triangle, stamp:arena

title: Query Syntax
text: can find specific prints available different Magic game environments game: keyword. games paper, mtgo, arena supported. can filter card’s availability game : keyword. games paper, mtgo, arena supported. Find prints available digitally (MTGO Arena) :digital. Find promotional cards (environment) :promo. Find cards Story Spotlights :spotlight. Find cards Scryfall honor previewing :scryfallpreview.

title: Query Syntax
text: can use numeric expressions (>, <, =, >=, <=, !=) find cards released relative certain year yyyy-mm-dd date. can also use set code stand set’s release date.

title: Query Syntax
text: can use art:, atag:, arttag: find things card’s illustration. can use function:, otag:, oracletag: find “Oracle” tags describe function card. Data two features comes Tagger project.

title: Query Syntax
text: can find reprints :reprint, cards new set :reprint, cards single set :unique. can also compare number times card printed syntax like prints=1, number sets card sets=1. can also compared including paper sets paperprints=1 papersets=1.

title: Query Syntax
text: can request cards certain languages lang:/language: keywords. can widen search language special lang:keyword. can also find first printing card language using new:language printings card ’s printed language least : (e.g. :ru find cards ever printed Russian.)

title: Query Syntax
text: search system includes convenience shortcuts common card sets: can find interesting land groups :bikeland (alias cycleland, bicycleland), :bounceland (alias karoo), :canopyland (alias canland), :checkland, :dual, :fastland, :fetchland, :filterland, :gainland, :painland, :scryland, :shadowland, :shockland, :storageland, :creatureland, :triland, :tangoland (alias battleland) can find Masterpiece Series cards :masterpiece

title: Query Syntax
text: keywords except include can negated prefixing hyphen (-). inverts meaning keyword reject cards matched ’ve searched . : keyword convenient inverted mode : -:. Conversely, -: :. Loose name words can also inverted -.

title: Query Syntax
text: can use forward slashes // instead quotes type:, t:, oracle:, o:, flavor:, ft:, name: keywords match parts card regular expression. Scryfall supports many regex features .*?, option groups (|b), brackets [ab], character classes \\d, \\w, anchors (?!), \\b, ^, $. Forward slashes inside regex must escaped \\/. Full documentation keyword available vignette("regex").

title: Query Syntax
text: prefix words quoted phrases ! find cards exact name . still case-insensitive.

title: Query Syntax
text: default every search term enter combined. must match find card. want search set options choices, can put special word /terms.

title: Query Syntax
text: may nest conditions inside parenthesis ( ) group together. useful combined keyword. Remember terms separated still combined.

title: Query Syntax
text: can enter display options searches keywords rather using scry_cards()’s arguments. Select duplicate results eliminated unique:cards, unique:prints (previously ++), unique:art (also @@). Change results shown display:grid, display:checklist, display:full, display:text. Change results sorted order:artist, order:cmc, order:power, order:toughness, order:set, order:name, order:usd, order:tix, order:eur, order:rarity, order:color, order:released, order:spoiled, order:edhrec, order:review. Select printings cards preferentially show prefer:oldest, prefer:newest, prefer:usd-low prefer:usd-high (equivalents tix eur), prefer:promo. Change order sorted data direction:asc direction:desc.

title: An Interface To Scryfall
text: scry simple, light, robust interface R Scryfall’s powerful Magic: Gathering card search engine. wraps Scryfall API makes endpoints available simple functions R programmer can use.

title: An Interface To Scryfall
text: can install development version scry GitHub :
code: # Install released version from CRAN install.packages("scry") # install.packages("devtools") devtools::install_github("curso-r/scry")

title: An Interface To Scryfall
text: scry makes easy process Magic cards’ data programatically. many endpoints fully support tidyverse compatible analyses. information, start vignette("scry") full documentation.

title: Retrieve information about cards — scry-cards
code: scry_cards(   q,   unique = "cards",   order = "name",   dir = "auto",   include_extras = FALSE,   include_multilingual = FALSE,   include_variations = FALSE,   page = NULL )  scry_card(id, source = "scryfall")  scry_card_name(name, mode = c("fuzzy", "exact"), set = NULL)  scry_card_number(number, set, lang = "en")  scry_card_random(q = NULL)

title: Retrieve information about cards — scry-cards
text: q search query using fulltext search system Scryfall uses. information see vignette("syntax"). unique strategy omitting similar cards. options : cards: Removes duplicate gameplay objects (cards share name functionality). example, search matches one print Pacifism, one copy Pacifism returned. art: Returns one copy unique artwork matching cards. example, search matches one print Pacifism, one card different illustration Pacifism returned, cards duplicate artwork already results omitted. prints: Returns prints cards matched (disables rollup). example, search matches one print Pacifism, matching prints returned. order method sort returned cards. options : name: Sort cards name, → Z. set: Sort cards set collector number: AAA/#1 → ZZZ/#999. released: Sort cards release date: Newest → Oldest. rarity: Sort cards rarity: Common → Mythic. color: Sort cards color color identity: WUBRG → multicolor → colorless. usd: Sort cards lowest known U.S. Dollar price: 0.01 → highest, NA last. tix: Sort cards lowest known TIX price: 0.01 → highest, NA last. eur: Sort cards lowest known Euro price: 0.01 → highest, NA last. cmc: Sort cards converted mana cost: 0 → highest. power: Sort cards power: NA → highest. toughness: Sort cards toughness: NA → highest. edhrec: Sort cards EDHREC ranking: lowest → highest. artist: Sort cards front-side artist name: → Z. review: Sort cards podcasts review sets, usually color & CMC, lowest → highest, Booster Fun cards end. dir direction sort cards. options : auto: Scryfall automatically choose inuitive direction sort. asc: Sort ascending (direction arrows previous argument). desc: Sort descending (flip direction arrows previous argument). include_extras TRUE, extra cards (tokens, planes, etc) included. Equivalent adding include:extras search query. include_multilingual TRUE, cards every language supported Scryfall included. include_variations TRUE, rare care variants included, like Hairy Runesword. page results' page number return. NULL (default), available results returned. id Unique card indentifier. May refer supported source. source Source id refers. Can one scryfall, multiverse, mtgo, arena, tcgplayer cardmarket. name string card's name (part ). mode Search mode. Can either fuzzy (name may part card's name, allows misspellings partial words provided ) exact (name match exactly, case insenstive). set three five-letter set code. number card's collector number set. lang 2-3 character language code. information, see vignette("languages")

title: Retrieve information about cards — scry-cards
text: data frame 1 rows following columns: id [chr]: unique ID card Scryfall's database. name [chr]: name card. card multiple faces, column contain names separated ␣//␣. set [chr]: card's set code. lang [chr]: language code printing. information, see vignette("languages") colors [list]: card's colors, overall card colors defined rules. Otherwise colors card_faces column, see . color_identity [list]: card's color identity. color_indicator [list]: colors card's color indicator, . NULL value column indicates card one. mana_cost [chr]: mana cost card. value empty string "" cost absent. Remember per game rules, missing mana cost mana cost {0} different values. Multi-faced cards report value card_faces, see . cmc [dbl]: card's converted mana cost. Note funny cards fractional mana costs. oracle_text [chr]: Oracle text card, . power [chr]: card's power, . Note cards powers numeric, *. toughness [chr]: card's toughness, . Note cards toughnesses numeric, *. type_line [chr]: type line card. edhrec_rank [int]: card's overall rank/popularity EDHREC. cards ranked. hand_modifier [chr]: card's hand modifier, Vanguard card. value contain delta, -1. keywords [list]: vector keywords card uses, Flying Cumulative upkeep. layout [chr]: code card's layout. information see vignette("layouts") legalities [list]: data frame describing legality card across play formats. Possible legalities legal, not_legal, restricted, banned. life_modifier [chr]: card's life modifier, Vanguard card. value contain delta, +2. loyalty [chr]: loyalty . Note cards loyalties numeric, X. oversized [lgl]: Whether card oversized. produced_mana [list]: Colors mana card produce. reserved [lgl]: Whether card Reserved List. oracle_id [chr]: unique ID card's oracle identity. value consistent across reprinted card editions, unique among different cards name (tokens, Unstable variants, etc). arena_id [int]: card's Arena ID, . large percentage cards available Arena ID. mtgo_id, mtgo_foil_id [int]: card's Magic Online ID (also known Catalog ID), . large percentage cards available Magic Online ID. multiverse_ids [list]: card's multiverse IDs Gatherer, , vector integers. Note Scryfall includes many promo cards, tokens, esoteric objects identifiers. tcgplayer_id, tcgplayer_etched_id [int]: card's ID TCGplayer's API, also known productId. cardmarket_id [int]: card's ID Cardmarket's API, also known idProduct. uri [chr]: link card Scryfall's API. scryfall_uri [chr]: link card's permapage Scryfall's rulings_uri [chr]: link card's rulings list Scryfall's API. information see scry_ruling() prints_search_uri [chr]: link can begin paginating re/prints card Scryfall's API. website. all_parts [list]: card closely related cards, column data frame following columns: id [chr]: unique ID card Scryfall's database. object [chr]: content type object, always related_card. component [chr]: column explaining role card plays relationship, one token, meld_part, meld_result, combo_piece. name [chr]: name particular related card. type_line [chr]: type line card. uri [chr]: URI can retrieve full object describing card Scryfall's API. card_faces [list]: data frame card faces (card multifaced) following columns. information see vignette("layouts"). name [chr]: name particular face. colors [list]: face's colors, game defines colors individual face card. color_indicator [list]: colors face's color indicator, . mana_cost [chr]: mana cost face. value empty string "" cost absent. Remember per game rules, missing mana cost mana cost {0} different values. cmc [dbl]: mana value particular face, card reversible. oracle_text [chr]: Oracle text face, . power [chr]: face's power, . Note cards powers numeric, *. toughness [chr]: face's toughness, . type_line [chr]: type line particular face, card reversible. layout [chr]: layout card face, card reversible. loyalty [chr]: face's loyalty, . oracle_id [chr]: Oracle ID particular face, card reversible. artist [chr]: name illustrator card face. Newly spoiled cards may column yet. artist_id [chr]: faces's illustrator's unique identifier. flavor_name [chr]: just--fun name printed card (Godzilla series cards). flavor_text [chr]: flavor text printed face, . illustration_id [chr]: unique identifier card face artwork remains consistent across reprints. Newly spoiled cards may column yet. image_uris [list]: data frame providing URIs imagery face, double-sided card. card double-sided, image_uris column part parent object instead. printed_name [chr]: localized name printed face, . printed_text [chr]: localized text printed face, . printed_type_line [chr]: localized type line printed face, . watermark [chr]: watermark particulary card face, . artist [chr]: name illustrator card. Newly spoiled cards may column yet. booster [lgl]: Whether card found boosters. border_color [chr]: card's border color: black, white, borderless, silver, gold. card_back_id [chr]: Scryfall ID card back design present card. collector_number [chr]: card's collector number. Note collector numbers can contain non-numeric characters, letters ★. content_warning [lgl]: TRUE consider avoiding use print downstream. digital [lgl]: Whether card released video game. finishes [list]: vector computer-readable flags indicate card can come foil, nonfoil, etched, glossy finishes. flavor_name [chr]: just--fun name printed card (Godzilla series cards). flavor_text [chr]: flavor text, . frame_effects [list]: card's frame effects, . information see vignette("frames"). frame [chr]: card's frame layout. information see vignette("frames"). full_art [lgl]: Whether card's artwork larger normal. games [list]: vector games card print available , paper, arena, /mtgo. highres_image [lgl]: Whether card's imagery high resolution. illustration_id [chr]: unique identifier card artwork remains consistent across reprints. Newly spoiled cards may column yet. image_status [chr]: computer-readable indicator state card's image, one missing, placeholder, lowres, highres_scan. image_uris [list]: data frame listing available imagery card. information see vignette("imagery"). preview [list]: data frame providing information card's preview. prices [list]: data frame containing daily price information card, including usd, usd_foil, usd_etched, eur, tix prices, strings. printed_name [chr]: localized name printed card, . printed_text [chr]: localized text printed card, . printed_type_line [chr]: localized type line printed card, . promo [lgl]: Whether card promotional print. promo_types [list]: vector strings describing categories promo cards card falls . purchase_uris [list]: data frame providing URIs card's listing major marketplaces. rarity [chr]: card's rarity. One common, uncommon, rare, special, mythic, bonus. related_uris [list]: data frame providing URIs card's listing Magic: Gathering online resources. released_at [date]: date card first released. reprint [lgl]: Whether card reprint. scryfall_set_uri [chr]: link card's set Scryfall's website. set_name [chr]: card's full set name. set_search_uri [chr]: link can begin paginating card's set Scryfall API. set_type [chr]: type set printing . set_uri [chr]: link card's set Scryfall's API. information see ?scry_sets(). set_id [chr]: card's set Scryfall ID. story_spotlight [lgl]: Whether card Story Spotlight. textless [lgl]: Whether card printed without text. variation [lgl]: Whether card variation another printing. variation_of [chr]: printing ID printing card variation . security_stamp [chr]: security stamp card, . One oval, triangle, acorn, arena. watermark [chr]: card's watermark, .

title: Retrieve information about sets — scry-sets
text: data frame 1 rows following columns: id [chr]: unique ID set Scryfall change. code [chr]: unique three five-letter code set. See details. name [chr]: English name set. mtgo_code [chr]: unique code set MTGO, may differ regular code. arena_code [chr]: unique code set MTG Arena, may differ regular code. tcgplayer_id [int]: set’s ID TCGplayer’s API, also known groupId. uri [chr]: link set Scryfall’s API. scryfall_uri [chr]: link set’s permapage Scryfall’s search_uri [chr]: Scryfall API URI can request begin paginating cards set. released_at [date]: date set released first card printed set (GMT-8 Pacific time). set_type [chr]: Scryfall provides overall categorization Set set_type property. options : core: yearly Magic core set (Tenth Edition, etc). expansion: rotational expansion set block (Zendikar, etc). masters: reprint set contains new cards (Modern Masters, etc). masterpiece: Masterpiece Series premium foil cards. arsenal: Commander-oriented gift set. from_the_vault: Vault gift sets. spellbook: Spellbook series gift sets. premium_deck: Premium Deck Series decks. duel_deck: Duel Decks. draft_innovation: Special draft sets, like Conspiracy Battlebond. treasure_chest: Magic Online treasure chest prize sets. commander: Commander preconstructed decks. planechase: Planechase sets. archenemy: Archenemy sets. vanguard: Vanguard card sets. funny: funny un-set set funny promos (Unglued, Happy. Holidays, etc). starter: starter/introductory set (Portal, etc). box: gift box set. promo: set contains purely promotional cards. token: set made tokens emblems.. memorabilia: set made gold-bordered, oversize, trophy cards. legal. card_count [int]: number cards set. parent_set_code [chr]: set code parent set, . promo token sets often parent set. printed_size [int]: denominator set’s printed collector numbers. digital [lgl]: Whether set released video game. nonfoil_only [lgl]: Whether set contains nonfoil cards. foil_only [lgl]: Whether set contains foil cards. block_code [chr]: block code set, . block [chr]: block group name code set, . icon_svg_uri [chr]: URI SVG file set’s icon Scryfall’s CDN. Hotlinking image isn’t recommended, may change slightly time. download use locally particular user interface needs.

title: Retrieve information about sets — scry-sets
text: Due Magic's long complicated history, Scryfall includes many un-official sets way group promotional outlier cards together. sets likely code begins p t, pcel tori. Official sets always three-letter set code, zen.

title: Retrieve information about symbols — scry-symbols
code: scry_symbols()

title: Retrieve information about symbols — scry-symbols
text: data frame 1 row following columns: symbol [chr]: plaintext symbol. Often surrounded curly braces. Note symbols ASCII text (example, {∞}). colors [list]: vector colors symbol represents. cmc [dbl]: decimal number representing symbol’s converted mana cost. Note mana symbols funny sets can fractional converted mana costs. loose_variant [chr]: alternate version symbol, possible write without curly braces. english [chr]: English snippet describes symbol. Appropriate use alt text accessible communication formats. gatherer_alternates [list]: vector plaintext versions symbol Gatherer uses old cards describe original printed text. example: {W} <"oW", "ooW"> alternates. transposable [lgl]: Whether possible write symbol "backwards". example, official symbol {U/P} sometimes written {P/U} {P\U} informal settings. represents_mana [lgl]: Whether mana symbol. appears_in_mana_costs [lgl]: Whether symbol appears mana cost Magic card. example {20} column set FALSE {20} appears Oracle text, mana costs. funny [lgl]: Whether symbol used funny cards Un-cards. svg_uri [chr]: URI SVG image symbol Scryfall’s CDNs.

what: Retrieve information about bulk data files — scry_bulk_data
title: Retrieve information about bulk data files — scry_bulk_data
text: Scryfall provides daily exports card data bulk files. files represented bulk_data object via API. See details.

title: Retrieve information about bulk data files — scry_bulk_data
code: scry_bulk_data()

title: Retrieve information about bulk data files — scry_bulk_data
text: data frame 1 rows following columns: id [chr]: unique ID bulk item. name [chr]: human-readable name file. See details. type [chr]: computer-readable string kind bulk item. updated_at [dttm]: time file last updated. uri [chr]: Scryfall API URI file. description [chr]: human-readable description file. compressed_size [int]: size file integer bytes. download_uri [chr]: URI hosts bulk file fetching. content_type [chr]: MIME type file. content_encoding [chr]: Content-Encoding encoding used transmit file download .

title: Retrieve information about bulk data files — scry_bulk_data
text: URLs files change timestamp day, can fetched programmatically. currently available files following: Oracle Cards: JSON file containing one Scryfall card Oracle ID Scryfall. chosen sets cards attempt return --date recognizable version card. Unique Artwork: JSON file Scryfall cards together contain unique artworks. chosen cards promote best image scans. Default Cards: JSON file containing every card Scryfall English printed language card available one language. Cards: JSON file containing every card Scryfall every language. Rulings: JSON file containing Rulings Scryfall. ruling refers cards via oracle_id. Please note: Cards bulk data include price information, prices considered dangerously stale 24 hours. use bulk price information track trends provide general estimate card value. Prices updated frequently enough power storefront sales system. consume price information risk. Updates gameplay data (card names, Oracle text, mana costs, etc) much less frequent. need gameplay information, downloading card data per week right set releases likely sufficient. Every card type every product included, including planar cards, schemes, Vanguard cards, tokens, emblems, funny cards. Bulk data collected every 12 hours. can use scry_cards() retrieve fresh objects instead.
